segments.text: Whoa, the sink is flooding right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet running wild, no one's stopping it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman drying dishes, totally zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the water puddle growing fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then I spot the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching way up into the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar open, hand inside grabbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl below, hand up like 'gimme one'.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're pulling off a sneaky cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window to the garden frames the normal outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This indoor scene is wild by comparison.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Didn't expect such mischief and mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
